traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Olara can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Olara has advantage on saving throws to end the {@condition charmed} condition on herself, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Olara makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
